sql.Text: select count(a.CompanyId) from Company as a @where

select top @pageSize * from (select row_number() over(order by @orderbyStr) as rownumber, a.CompanyId, a.Name, a.Description from Company as a @where ) as temp_table where rownumber between @pageSize*(@currentPageNo-1)+1 and @pageSize*(@currentPageNo)
select a.CompanyId as , a.Name as , a.Description as from Company as a @where
